name: Energy Force Omega
description:
Energy Force Omega is a puzzle-platformer game where you are trying to pass every level by collecting all the power cells, while fighting gravity and dimentions! You are a ball named Omega that bounces infinitely, trying to collect all the power cells to charge yourself so that you can be free.

You are on your planet's surface and you are trying to escape to the outer space. But unfortunately you are trapped in parallel dimensions on that planet so you need to escape. This planet REALLY doesn't want you to escape it.

You fight gravity and different dimentions to escape this insane planet. Will you be able to do that?

̨̞͙̬͍̀ͅD͔̞̺͕̼̖̪͡o҉̶͏̥͈̝̻͚ ̵̻̮y̢͈o̷͖̫u͍̖̮̙͘͘ ̶̤̳̺͉͜r̢̞̖̗̞͎̪̳̣͉ȩ̡̦͉̹͈̞̼̟͝a̧̛̱̘̟̙̹̥ļ̖̮͍̝͢͢ļ̛̘̦͓͘y͏̹͓̤̹͖ ̨̣̬̗͝n̸̺̳̬̜͓ȩ͙̳̩̟ḛ̵̖̻͕̝̘͚͍͝d͓̺̫̭̀ ̵̶̲̜̜t̵̪̯̰̺͔̘o̲̫̠̣̰͓͘͟ͅ ͎̣̕e̴̜̖̫̗͖̭͡͝s̟̺͡c̡̢̤̰̲̙a҉̹̙͉̭͟p̧̖̝̩̼̼̗̦͘e̵̫̻͚̝̼̺̻̪ ̨̜̳̜̥͍͟a͔̞͓̬̞̥̬̕f͙̪̳̬̳͔t̶͎̱̯e̴͈̻̹̦̲͙̰̺͠r̹̳̙͇̬̖͜͢͟ ̨̼̩͖̬͢͝a͖̭̝l̛̜͈̤̱̝͓͉͞ḽ̴͎̪͕͜͟?̠̦̪̤̩̲̯̹͕͡ ̸͖̺͓͖͜͡Ẁ͙͕̭̼̦̗h͚̲̙͙͡͞͠e͎͍̕r̘̱͔͠e̜̗ ̣̺̯͕̳͍͈w̻͟͢i͈̭̺̮̕͝l͇͇̜̖lͅ ͇̰͓̙͉͇̺y̴̶͈̱o̝͚̕u̷̫̫̦̯̻ͅ ̣̮̗̪̮̫̠̤̕͜g̫̜͙̱̭͈͎̜͡͡o͓͇̠͇͖̰͔̩?̙̬̰͍̯͕ ̵̠̩͇͍͉̱͕͘S̡̙̭͟t͍̻̰̯͓̦͖͟a̶̛̬̫̰̰͜y҉͈̗̠͙̗̻̥,͙̖͍̕͜ͅ ͏̳̜̹̗͕͚͇́i̲͕͙̪̣̼̤͜t̲̼̟͖̘̫̝̻͢͢ ̤͟͢i̵̘̖͓̘͍s̲ ҉̟͓̤n͎̩̟̪̥͎̘͔i̷͎̫̹̬̳̪̭͢ͅc̪̕͝ę̭̺͓̝ ̢͍̝͇̫̰͡͡h̴̨̩̫̦̖̥͕̦̱̳͢e̬ŗ̸̫̳̻̥͉̭̮̺e̱͍̝͎͟ ̜̗̥͇͇̗̪̯͠w͚͜ì͚̝͢t̟͕͓͎̝͚̖̘͙͝ḩ̛̛̮̻̱̜̤̯͓̠ͅ ̴̳̫u͙͙̖s͎̤̩̫̠͙̪̕͟͝.̨̲̯̣͖̠͜.̨̲.̻̱ ̬̰̖́͢F̨͇̞̖̺̺̦̀ǫ̣͍͉̬̩̝̀r̷̶̬̕e͡͏̲̦̬̲̹̦̝ͅv̨͖̙̝̱̬e͍͍r̴̦̭̕͠.̧̛͇̞͓͙̩.̭̺̲̘̬̘͔̤.̵̝̫̠͓̪̥͎̝͢

  • Windows 32 / 64
  • Linux 32 / 64
  • Mac 64
